item.title: using github pages api
item.description: goal use Github API to check deployment status of my GH Pages resource https://developer.github.com/v3/guides/getting-started/ how to use requires authentication to retrieve info about GH Pages site. use Personal Access Token in header of API request: curl -H "Authorization: token $PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN" -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" https://api.github.com/repos/yeeitsjulia/yeeitsjulia.github.io/pages slightly irrelevant learnings what’s the difference between Deploy keys, SSH keys, Personal access tokens? Deploy keys: SSH key for a specific repository SSH keys: for SSH connections for your whole Github account Personal access tokens: used for HTTPS connection and to access Github API.
